data.message: how i can verify my official fan page???

replies.message: Hey there, Fawad. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1QaZISX. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://on.fb.me/1jKseMF. Thanks. -Kate
http://on.fb.me/1jKseMF...this link may have expired....???send me a new fresh link if u can...
